sentences.sentence: The ill-advised conceit of the guardian angel dooms the film from the start.
sentences.translation: 对守护天使的蹩脚设计弄巧成拙，从一开始就注定这部电影要失败。

sentences.sentence: One string ties two locusts.; the dooms of the two are closely linked.
He who does not learn from history dooms to repeat it.
sentences.translation: 不向历史学习的人注定要重蹈覆辙。
